Character_1.Name: Pikachu
Character_1.Character_Summary: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its agility and electric attacks. It excels in speed and special attack, but has weaknesses against Ground-type moves.

Move_1.Description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

Move_2.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.

Move_3.Description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.

Move_4.Description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target, the faster the user is compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

Character_2.Name: Charizard
Character_2.Character_Summary: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon known for its powerful fire-based attacks and ability to fly. It has high special attack and speed, but is vulnerable to Rock, Water, and Electric-type moves.

Move_1.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

Move_2.Description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

Move_3.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky.

Move_4.Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon.
